<file>
00001| # <a name="up"/>Vozovoz API 2.5
00002| 
00003| [Main page](/en/README.md) > [Objects](index.md) > Cost of the order
00004| 
00005| 
00006| > **Object code: `price`**
00007| 
00008| 
00009| ## Contents
00010| 
00011| * [Examples](#example)
00012| * [Description](#description)
00013| 
00014| 
00015| ## <a name="example"/>Examples
00016| 
00017| **Example of the request in JavaScript**
00018| ```javascript
00019| // full javascript code to use in web browser developer console, see in "Quick start" section
00020| xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(
00021| {
00022|   "object": "price",
00023|   "action": "get",
00024|   "params": {
00025|     "cargo" : {
00026|       "dimension": { // cargo dimensions
00027|         "quantity": 1, // quantity of colli
00028|         "volume": 0.1, // general volume
00029|         "weight": 0.9 // general weight
00030|       }
00031|     },
00032|     "gateway": {
00033|       "dispatch": { // where from (shipping)
00034|         "point": {
00035|           "location": "Санкт-Петербург",
00036|           "terminal": "default" // default terminal for location "Санкт-Петербург"
00037|         }
00038|       },
00039|       "destination": { // where to (delivery)
00040|         "point": {
00041|           "location": "Москва",
00042|           "terminal": "default" // default terminal for location "Москва"
00043|         }
00044|       }
00045|     }
00046|   }
00047| }));
00048| ```
00049| 
00050| **Example of the response**
00051| ```json
00052| {
00053|   "response": {
00054|     "basePrice": 1250,
00055|     "price": 1200,
00056|     "service": [
00057|       {
00058|         "name": "Перевозка между городами",
00059|         "price": 370
00060|       },
00061|       {
00062|         "name": "Страхование груза без объявленной стоимости",
00063|         "price": 35
00064|       },
00065|       {
00066|         "name": "Забор груза от клиента",
00067|         "price": 363
00068|       },
00069|       {
00070|         "name": "Отвоз груза клиенту",
00071|         "price": 432
00072|       }
00073|     ],
00074|     "deliveryTime": {
00075|       "from": 1,
00076|       "to": 1
00077|     }
00078|   }
00079| }
00080| ```
00081| 
00082| 
00083| ## <a name="description"/>Description
00084| 
00085| Represents an array of services with a specified cost, as well as the total cost with and without discount(s).
00086| 
00087| 
00088| ### Request data
00089| 
00090| | Structure   | Type   | Description                                    |
00091| |-------------|--------|------------------------------------------------|
00092| | Required    |
00093| | `cargo`     | object | [`cargo` structure](../structure/cargo.md)     |
00094| | `gateway`   | object | [`gateway` strucutre](../structure/gateway.md) |
00095| | Optional    | 
00096| | `promoCode` | string | Contains optional promo code                   |
00097| 
00098| 
00099| ### Response data
00100| 
00101| | Name              | Type    | Description                                                      |
00102| |-------------------|---------|------------------------------------------------------------------|
00103| | basePrice         | integer | Basic cost with no discounts (in most cases in Russian rubles)   |
00104| | price             | integer | Total cost including discounts (in most cases in Russian rubles) |
00105| | service           | array   | Array of services, indicating the name and cost with discounts   |                                                            
00106| | service\[n].name  | string  | Name of the service                                              |
00107| | service\[n].price | integer | Cost of the service with discounts                               |
00108| | deliveryTime      | object  | Delivery time range in days                                      |
00109| | deliveryTime.from | integer | Minimum delivery time in days                                    |
00110| | deliveryTime.to   | integer | Maximum delivery time in days                                    |
00111| 
00112| 
00113| ***
00114| [▲ Up](#up)
</file>
